Hi! I'm Zach Rowe, A DevOps Engineer.

Magna Aliquam

About Me

I was born in a small town. Now I live in a big city. In between I got a Computer Science degree from Rensselaer. Now I work for a federal conractor in Washington, D.C.. I write code in Ruby and python, and do DevOps. To that end I have both an AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional and an AWS Certified Developer - Associate certification

I've also obtained my Basic Chef Fluency and Local Cookbook Development badges
